id.description: The unique identifier for the product from Caffitella.

link.description: The URL link to the product page on the Caffitella website.

image_link.description: The URL link to the product image.

price.description: The price of the product as a string.

categories.description: An object containing the categories the product belongs to.

category.description: An array of category strings that the product belongs to.

description.description: A detailed description of the product.

name: Caffitella Product Feed
description: Schema for product data feed from the vendor Caffitella.
